lead_paragraph: Mike Napoli had a solo homer and a run-scoring double as Cleveland moved within a game of clinching the A.L. pennant despite losing Bauer after just two-thirds of an inning.

headline.content_kicker: Indians 4, Blue Jays 2 | Cleveland leads series, 3-0
headline.print_headline: Bloody Finger Stops a Starter, but the Indians’ Bullpen Patches Things Up
headline.main: A Bloody Finger Sidelines Trevor Bauer Early, but the Indians Barely Flinch
headline.kicker: Indians 4, Blue Jays 2 | Cleveland leads series, 3-0

snippet: Mike Napoli had a solo homer and a run-scoring double as Cleveland moved within a game of clinching the A.L. pennant despite losing Bauer after just two-thirds of an inning....
abstract: Cleveland Indians beat Toronto Blue Jays, 4-2, to take 3-0 lead in American League Championship series.
